testcase.name: Verify it is possible to enter a text in the "<Field name>" input field - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given A user navigates to the home page.....................................passed And Clicks to the "Edit" link...............................................passed When Enters "John Doe" into the "Enter your full Name" input field..........passed Then "John Doe" is presented in the "Enter your full Name" input field......passed

testcase.name: Verify it is possible to append a text in the "<Field name>" input field - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given A user navigates to the home page.....................................passed And Clicks to the "Edit" link...............................................passed When Appends a text "Some text with numbers 123 and characters !@#$%^&*()" into the "Append a text and press keyboard tab" input field.passed Then "Some text with numbers 123 and characters !@#$%^&*()" is presented in the "Append a text and press keyboard tab" input field.passed

testcase.name: Verify it is possible to print out the content of the "<Field name>" input field - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given A user navigates to the home page.....................................passed And Clicks to the "Edit" link...............................................passed Then The content of the "What is inside the text box" input field is printed out.passed

testcase.name: Verify it is possible to clear a text in the "<Field name>" input field - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given A user navigates to the home page.....................................passed And Clicks to the "Edit" link...............................................passed When Clears a text in the "Clear the text" input field......................passed Then "" is in the "Clear the text" input field..............................passed

testcase.name: Verify the edit field "<Field name>" is disabled - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given A user navigates to the home page.....................................passed And Clicks to the "Edit" link...............................................passed Then Input field "Confirm edit field is disabled" is disabled...............passed

testcase.name: Verify the edit field "<Field name>" is readonly - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given A user navigates to the home page.....................................passed And Clicks to the "Edit" link...............................................passed Then Edit field "Confirm text is readonly" is readonly......................passed
